Index.Descripcion: The map has a filter in which you will be able to select what you are looking for (hotels, restaurants, camping areas, routes, museums, activities to do ...), and depending on what is selected, the points on the map will be marked, where you It will indicate that in that place you can find what you are looking for, you just have to click on the municipality you want to go to, or you can click directly to the point that the map indicates. And that way you can enter and consult the information you need to have the best experience.

Blog.Titulo1: ¿WHY TRAVEL TO THE DEPARTMENT OF HUILA?
Blog.Descripcion1:
When we talk about traveling through Colombia, within our selection, we choose the Department of Huila, which has a great variety of tourist destinations that are worth visiting.

Within the great variety that we can find, we go from cultural tourism to the San Agustín Archaeological Park, with its culture embodied in the statues that consecrate a great history of our ancestors.

Then we pass through the burning lands of the Tatacoa Desert in the municipality of Villavieja, where we will find beautiful landscapes with the variety of colors of the earth of this magnificent destination that at night contrasts its unparalleled beauty standing out with a starry sky cataloged by many tourists as the favorite site for astronomical tourism.

Continuing with this journey of attractive sites we will find in the municipality of Paicol where we will find the Caja de Agua a cave where the waters of the imposing Páez River bathe its picturesque landscapes, in which deep caverns and centenary royal roads cross the wonderful scenery where the town of Paicol was built; surely without its founders imagining that the confluence of so many natural attractions would make it a meeting point for adventurers who love rafting, caving, rappelling and hiking.

And if your thing is the Extreme Adventure in the Municipality of Pitalito we will find the perfect place to carry out activities from the height of the municipality of Isnos passing through the imposing Mortiño waterfall, Salto de Bordones and the Magdalena River, where suspended from a hammock, rope, swing among other elements that will make your visit an unforgettable experience.
Blog.Descripcion2:
If it is about traveling and you are looking for where to travel in Colombia, camping in the desert with plans and prices adjusting to the comfort of the adventurer.

The tatacoa desert is located in the department of Huila, and the second largest desert area in Colombia. to be able to reach the Tatacoa desert from the bamboo capital of Colombia 38 kilometers to the NORTH.

The most curious thing about this desert is that at the beginning it was a very populated vegetal area, however, with the climatic changes it became what it is today. Here brown, ocher and gray colors prevail, which gives it a very exotic appearance, with its mountains of earth; between 50 centimeters and 4 meters high, which form curious labyrinths that invite you to get lost in them.

La Tatacoa has two characteristic colors: ocher in the Cuzco sector and gray in the Los Hoyos area.

It constitutes a geographical landscape composed of geological formations. Its area covers an area of 330 km². It is located near the urban area of the municipality of Villavieja.

With a warm climate, Tatacoa has managed to position itself as one of the main tourist attractions of Huila not only because of its proximity to the capital of Huila but also because of its flora and fauna.

For adventure lovers, camping one night in the middle of the Tatacoa desert is a magical and unforgettable experience due to the connection with the starry skies which can be seen with the naked eye.

For astronomy lovers, this desert is a perfect place to see stars in Colombia due to its low noise and light pollution. From here you can see 88 constellations, meteor showers and different astronomical events.

QuienesSomos.Descripcion: In Aventúrate you will be able to find information about the different tourist sites that the Huila department offers such as hotels, restaurants, camping areas, routes, museums, activities to do and everything you might need when embarking on an adventure.

Privacidad.Descripcion5:
A cookie refers to a file that is sent with the purpose of requesting permission to be stored on your computer, by accepting such a file is created and the cookie then serves to have information regarding web traffic, and also facilitates future visits to a recurring website. Another function that cookies have is that with them the web can recognize you individually and therefore provide you with the best personalized service of your web.

our website uses cookies to identify the pages that are visited and their frequency. This information is used only for statistical analysis and then the information is permanently deleted. You can delete cookies at any time from your computer. However, cookies help to provide a better service from websites, they do not give access to information about your computer or you, unless you choose to provide it directly. You can accept or deny the use of cookies, however most browsers automatically accept cookies as it serves to have a better web service. You can also change the settings on your computer to decline cookies. If you decline cookies you may not be able to use some of our services.
Privacidad.Descripcion6: This web site may contain links to other sites that may be of interest to you. Once you click on these links and leave our site, we no longer have control over the site to which you are redirected and therefore we are not responsible for the terms or privacy or data protection of those other third party sites. Those sites are subject to their own privacy policies and you should check with them to confirm that you agree with them.
Privacidad.Descripcion7:
At any time you may restrict the collection or use of personal information that is provided to our website. In case you have checked the option to receive our newsletter or advertising you can cancel it at any time.
